name: Typing of the west
description:
I made this game in a week-end (actually, about a day). It's based on Typing of The Dead, a game where you have to type words to kill zombies. In this, you have to type a word to win in a wild western standoff. It's currently set to 'in progress' because there's a few things I want to add (highscore + leaderboard) but it's a finished game you can play.

I suppose I have to say I used this asset for most of the UI icons because I'm crap at making my own and didn't want to spend another day on it.
